gurmukhi: bwsu kIE ibiKAwn so bYT kY; AYsy hI AYsy su bYs ibqwieE ]
transliteration: Baas Ko( i)  Bikhiaan So Baith Sai Aise Hoo Aise Su Bais Bitaaio||
translation: He spends his life in such performing evil actions and wastes his life in such pursuits.

gurmukhi: swcu khON sun lyhu sBY; ijn pRymu kIE iqn hI pRBu pwieE ]9]29]
transliteration: Saach(u) Kahon Soun Leh(u) Sabhai Jin Prem Ko( i)  Tin Hoo Prabh Paaio||9||29||
translation: I speak Truth, all should turn their ears towards it: he, who is absorbed in True Love, he would realize the Lord. 9.29.

gurmukhi: kwhU lY pwhn pUj DrXo isr; kwhU lY ilMgu gry ltkwieE ]
transliteration: Kaahoo Lai Pahann Puuj Dharaiyo Sir Kahoo Lai Ling Gaaree Latkai ||
translation: Someone worshipped stone and placed it on his head. Someone hung the phallus (lingam) from his neck.

gurmukhi: kwhU liKE hir AvwcI idsw mih; kwhU pCwh ko sIs invwieE ]
transliteration: Kaahoo Lakhio Har(i) Avaachoo Disaa Maih Kaahoo Pachhaad Ko Soos(u) Nivaaio||
translation: Someone visualized God in the South and someone bowed his head towards the West.

gurmukhi: koaU buqwn ko pUjq hY psu; koaU imRqwn ko pUjn DwieE ]
transliteration: Ko( i)  Boutaan Ko Poojat Hai Pas(u) Ko( i)  Mritaan Ko Poojan Dhnio||
translation: Some fool worships the idols and someone goes to worship the dead.

gurmukhi: kUr ik®Aw auriJE sB hI jg; sRI Bgvwn ko Bydu n pwieE ]10]30]
transliteration: Koor Kriaa Urjhio Sabh Hoo Jag Sri Bhagvaan Ko Bhed(u) Na Paaio||10||30||
translation: The whole world is entangled in false rituals and has not known the secret of Lord-God 10.30.

gurmukhi: hir jnm mrn ibhIn ]ds cwr cwr pRbIn ]
transliteration: Har(i) Janam Maran Bihoon Das Chaar Chaar Praboon||
translation: The Lord is sans birth and death, He is skiful in all eighteen sciences.

transliteration: Akalank Roop Apaar|| Anchhijj Tej Udaar||1||31||
translation: That unblemished Entity is Infinite, His Benevolent Glory is Everlasting. 1.31.

gurmukhi: AniB`j rUp durMq ]sB jgq Bgq mhMq ]
transliteration: Anbhijj Roop Durant|| Sabh Jagad Bhagad Mahant||
translation: His Unaffected Entity is All-Pervasive, He is the Supreme Lord of the saints of all the world.

gurmukhi: js iqlk BUBiRq Bwn ]ds cwr cwr inDwn ]2]32]
transliteration: Jas Tilak Bhoobhrit Bhaan|| Das Chaar Chaar Nidhaan||2||32||
translation: He is the frontal mark of Glory and life-giver sun of the earth, He is the Treasure of eighteen sciences. 2.32.

gurmukhi: AklMk rUp Apwr ]sB lok sok ibdwr ]
transliteration: Akalank Roop Apaar|| Sabh Lok Sok Bidaar||
translation: He, the Unblemished Entity is Infinite, He is the destroyer of sufferings of all the worlds.

gurmukhi: kl kwl krm ibhIn ]sB krm Drm pRbIn ]3]33]
transliteration: Kal Kaal Karal Bihoon|| Sabh Karam Dharam Praboon||3||33||
translation: He is without the rituals of Iron age, He is an adept in all religious works. 3.33.

gurmukhi: AnKMf Aqul pRqwp ]sB QwipE ijh Qwp ]
transliteration: Ankhanndatul Prataap|| Sabh Thaapio Jih Thaap||
translation: His Glory is Indivisible and Inestimable, He is the Establisher of all the institutions.
